import './App.css'; import React,{useState} from 'react' import {appContext} from './Components/Context.js' import {First,Second,Third} from './Components' const choices=['Bitcoin',"Etherium","Dogecoin","Litecoin","Chainlink"] function App() { const [preferences,setPreferences]=useState({first:"Not Selected", second :"Not Selected", third:"Not Selected" }) return(

{preferences.first}

{preferences.second}

{preferences.third}

) } export default App;
